projects.label: Internal Application code migration and SaaS transition
bullets: Successfully planned and executed the migration of an existing internal-facing application from server-side rendered Jinja templates to a Vue.js Single Page Application (SPA) architecture.
Managed the transition of the application to a Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) model, including setting up payment and subscription mechanisms using Stripe.
Designed and implemented a robust user authorization and permission management system to ensure secure access to different application features based on user groups.

projects.label: Database Performance Enhancement
bullets: Overhauled the application back-end by implementing database partitioning to optimize data storage and retrieval, resulting in significantly reduced query times and improved overall application performance.

projects.label: Cost-Effective Data Management
bullets: Developed a data cleanup tool that safely removes old and unnecessary data from the application's database, achieving a ~40% reduction in monthly storage costs.

projects.label: Tech Stack and Tools
bullets: Utilized Python and Flask to build backend services and RESTful APIs to support the Vue.js frontend.
Employed Vue.js and JavaScript to create a responsive and dynamic user interface, enhancing user experience.
Managed server configuration and deployment using Nginx and Ubuntu on cloud-based infrastructure.
Designed and optimized database interactions using PostgreSQL.

projects.label: Team Management and Collaboration
bullets: Worked remotely as an integral part of the Reflexive Media team, collaborating effectively across time zones and communicating progress, challenges, and solutions.
Led a development team, providing mentorship, guidance, and supervision to team members.
Conducted regular code reviews to ensure code quality, consistency, and adherence to best practices.
Delegated tasks and assignments to team members, effectively managing workloads and deadlines.

projects.label: CBS
bullets: Used React, Redux, and Sagas for creating components and connecting to API
Wrote user authentication logic using the Okta library to connect with existing Single Sign On
Collaborated with international team across multiple timezones

projects.label: Global Payments
bullets: Used Node and Electron to create desktop application that accepts file uploads
Parsed, normalized, and diffed file uploads, output detailed TSV report showing variance between files
Participated in code reviews and unit testing

projects.label: HP
bullets: Used C# and WinForms to create desktop application and background processes
Implemented dynamically generated SQLite database tables to retain user data and push to central server
Made system calls in separate threads to monitor client device

projects.label: Internal Talent Management Tool
bullets: Planned and implemented application architecture using AWS resources (EC2, VPC, Lambda, RDS)
Designed table schema for PostgreSQL database
Wrote an AWS Lambda function (Node.js) to consume and parse nested JSON objects and write changes to database

projects.label: First American Bankcard
bullets: Developed a reporting dashboard to query transaction and customer data and download reports in PDF and Excel formats
Used AWS Lambda to periodically run a function that pulls CSV files from an S3 bucket to parse and insert into a SQL database
Participated in client meetings to discuss progress and planning of new features

projects.label: Jefferson Parish Juvenile Court
bullets: Built a dashboard to query user data and progress users through different stages of the program
Developed a console application using Twilio to pull user data from a SQL database and send SMS notifications to clients based on progress in the program
Designed and developed application for court staff to review cases, process and upload necessary documents, schedule meetings, and email iCal events to relevant parties
